page.title: 16 Transport
page.content: Linlithgow is well served by Road and Rail.There is easy access to the M9 which runs between Edinburgh and Glasgow and offers routes to Stirling and the North, and Fife and the East. The Bus Routes cover a wide area.Local services are frequent. The Railway Station has just been renovated.Rail Services between Edinburgh and Glasgow are convenient, and provide numerous commuter services. Linlithgow is a dormitory town with many people working in Edinburgh. In the past the Union Canal was a busy waterway between Edinburgh and Glasgow.It is now used for recreational purposes.
